**Site Type:** Document-Centric, Technical Documentation, Educational Resource   
**Purpose:** Developer Education, Content Author Training, AI Integration Guidance  
**Technology Stack:** Adobe Edge Delivery Services, Document-Based Architecture   
**Authors:** Tom Cranstoun, Cate Nisbet


## Access Guidelines

- Base Rate: 100 requests per hour per IP
- Cache Retention: 24 hour maximum
- Content Usage: Attribution required
- Commercial Use: Requires written permission
- Training Usage: Permitted for public documentation only
- Attribution Format: "Source: Digital Domain Technologies (allabout.network)"

## Developer Documentation

- [EDS Introduction](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/developer-guide-to-document-authoring-with-edge-delivery-services-part-0): Complete beginner's guide and concepts  
- [Basic Implementation](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/developer-guide-to-document-authoring-with-edge-delivery-services-part-1): Core setup and configuration  
- [Block Development](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/developer-guide-to-document-authoring-with-edge-delivery-services-part-2): Component creation and customization  
- [Data Integration](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/developer-guide-to-document-authoring-with-edge-delivery-services-part-3): Working with spreadsheets and JSON  
- [SPA Development](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/developer-guide-to-document-authoring-with-edge-delivery-services-part-4): Single Page Application architecture  
- [React Implementation](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/developer-guide-to-document-authoring-with-edge-delivery-services-part-5): React integration guide  
- [GitHub Integration](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/developer-guide-to-document-authoring-with-edge-delivery-services-part-6): Version control workflow  
- [Component Library](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/developer-guide-to-document-authoring-with-edge-delivery-services-part-7): Reusable block collection  
- [AI Development Guide](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/developer-guide-to-document-authoring-with-edge-delivery-services-part-8): AI integration basics  
- [Best Practices](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/developer-guide-to-document-authoring-with-edge-delivery-services-part-9): Development standards and optimization

## AI Integration

- [AI-Powered Development](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/eds-ai) : AI Development with EDS  
- [https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/building-the-ai-native-web-with-eds](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/building-the-ai-native-web-with-eds)  Implementation of llms.txt standard

## Content Author Resources

- [Content Creation Basics](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/content-creator-guide-to-document-authoring-with-edge-delivery-services): Getting started guide  
- [Advanced Authoring](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/content-creator-guide-to-document-authoring-with-edge-delivery-services-part-2): Advanced techniques  
- [Content Optimization](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/content-creator-guide-to-document-authoring-with-edge-delivery-services-part-3): Best practices for authors  
- [Management Overview](https://allabout.network/blogs/ddt/a-managers-guide-to-document-authoring-with-edge-delivery-services): Executive summary
